issues.guideline: CTAは48-72px、単一配置、ラベルは最短

violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

any.message: Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.29 (foreground color: #16a34a, background color: #ffffff, font size: 9.2pt (12.25px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.29 (foreground color: #16a34a, background color: #ffffff, font size: 9.2pt (12.25px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
